metadata.title: Tuesday, 27th June, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to procure a motor vehicle for the police in Lumezi District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the construction of the Musele - Sobingi road in LupososhiParliamentary Constituency has stalled;
(c) what the cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) whether the Government has any climate change mitigation programmes in Southern Province;
(b) if so, whether a massive tree planting programme is one of the measures under consideration; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether there is tourism potential in Chinsali District; and
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to harness the potential.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to engage private companies to start using drones to transport medical and agriculture drugs to areas that are difficult to reach by road;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(c) which companies have expressed interest in undertaking the exercise. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Kamboni Adopt Report of the Committee on National Guidance and Gender Matters: That this House do adopt the Report of the Committee on National Guidance and Gender Matters on Achieving the 50/50 Gender Parity in Governance and Decision-Making Positions in Zambia, for the Second Session of the Thirteenth National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on Wednesday, 14th June, 2023. ____________________________
